sections.summary: accomplished senior business systems analyst with over 10 years of business process, project management, and technology experience for fortune 500 companies. recognized success in driving projects of the highest level of complexity, critical business value, and corporate visibility. highlights international institute business analysis (iiba) certification - august 2011 demonstrated skills in business and systems analysis, project management, process mcdst certification - microsoft analysis and improvement, data analysis and mining, inventory control, and quality certified desktop support technician - assurance august 2007 lean six sigma certification - may 2013
